import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent { constructor() {} getCurrentYear(): number { return new Date().getFullYear(); } }
